Text:
BUNCH OF CRAZY BRAINWASHED NUTTERS !!

THANKS FOR THE UP .

Thanks for making this available. The author seems to have a rather large axe to grind and does it with extreme prejudice. Nope, I've never had anything to do with Scientology, but this guy has issues.
any chance you have goddard's book... a real classic...
I've got relatives in Clearwater, Florida. Believe me, you can't get a job for anything above fry cook, unless you're being "audited".
Fantastic book! Would recommend buying it to support sweeney. Anyone who screams in the face of tommy davies deserves a few quid haha
Scientology fascinates me. Feels like some bizarre trainwreck. Anyone have or seen the new Lawrence Wright "Going Clear" ?

I'm about half way thru "Going Clear" and its amazing. As a long time resident of Clearwater, I like to know everything about the creeps all over my town. John Sweeney is so nice! He has answered my tweets and retweeted things I've sent him! THANK YOU FOR THIS!!!
